extendedInfo.description: â¢ TOP 10 BEST GAME - The New York Times.â¢ #1 APP in the United States, Canada, China, Germany, France, Spain and many more!â¢ BEST OF GOOGLE PLAY. Featured "Editors' Choice", "Staff Pick", and "Best Arcade & Action" by Android. CORDY is the little robot with the big job - to power up his world! Help Cordy run, jump, push, pull, lift, throw, bounce, swing, and hover in this beautiful console-quality 3D puzzle platform game. Download now, and get ready to harness the power of pure fun!â¢ "One of mobile gaming's most accomplished platformers." -IGN.  "gorgeous... compelling" -Pocket Gamer & The Guardian.â¢ HOURS OF GAMEPLAY. The full game is packed with many more levels that increase in length: fast-paced fun, yet difficult to master!  "Tons of Replay Value" -Touch Arcade.â¢ PLAY FREE BEFORE YOU BUY. Try 4 free awesome levels so you can be sure you like the game. You can buy the full game from within using In-App Billing. This feature can then be turned off in the game's Settings.â¢ WANT MORE CORDY? THE ADVENTURE CONTINUES IN CORDY 2: ELECTRIC BOOGALOO! "Everything I want from a platformer is right here in Cordy 2." - Kotakuâ¢ WANT EVEN MORE GAMES LIKE THIS? Play SLEEPY JACK! Top 10 Best of E3: "Adorable Psychonauts-esque presentation and solid gameplay...that is also tight and arcadey" -Pocket Gamer BEST APP OF THE WEEK: "It's the sort of happiness-inducing experience that you want to share with everyone." -Kotakuâ¢ Xperia PLAY optimized.â¢ 'LIKE' SilverTree at facebook.com/TheMeedj & follow SilverTree on Twitter @silvertreemediaâ¢ PLAYERS, WE READ EVERY E-MAIL. We're a small company, but we reply to every support request. Let us try to help at cordysupport@silvertreemedia.com and we will do our best to help in any way! Thank you to our Android friends for naming SilverTree Media their "Top Developer!"

reviews.title: Great platformer!
reviews.comment: This is one of the best platform games for Android! It\'s simple but a lot of fun!
reviews.author: Ryann Curton

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: It\'s been a while since I\'ve found a good game. This one definitely makes my top 5 list, it has nice graphics, smooth game play, and the character is too dang cute. I would give 5 stars if the while game was free, and while I may not of paid to play the rest I deffinetly downloaded cordy sky and cordy 2
reviews.author: Trish Wood

reviews.title: Can\'t play the full game.
reviews.comment: I purchased the full game, but when I bought a new phone the DRM simply won\'t allow me to play past the fourth stage. When I click buy full game, it tells me I already own this item and then gives me a, \"Can\'t communicate with the server\" error.  No response from the developer, 1 star and I\'d recommend others stay away, especially if you\'re thinking about upgrading phones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game! This is a 4-level preview, but the full game is only $2.99 right now!\tThe graphics, gameplay, and characters are great! Backgrounds are crisp, clear, and beautifully rendered,  gameplay is fun & engaging, and the game, overall, is one of the best on the market, even still. Challenging, fun, and just so cute! A definite winner!
reviews.author: Melissa D Edwards

reviews.title: Too short
reviews.comment: The trial was far too short for me to decide if it would be worth it BUT even that didn\'t make me angry like the fact that after level 4 it asked me to buy the game.  I declined & it took me to the level menu.  It wouldn\'t let me escape.  It kept saying my purchase has been canceled when I hit the x.  It was continuing to try accessing the purchase menu.  How shady can you be?  That\'s way too easy for someone to accidentally click Yes in the mess of trying to close out the game.  Sorry is what it is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: I purchased the full version but none of the other levels will unlock!
reviews.author: Khole Kidd

reviews.comment: Great game to demonstrate Galaxy Tab as a gaming console.  How does one backup the progress in this? I kept loosing mine on each factory rest.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: make it full free and everyone will download it and this game will be an Editor\'s Choice!!!\tThis will be the best game i\'ve ever played if this will be free...
reviews.author: Duane Mendoza

reviews.title: Good, not great
reviews.comment: Unquestionably well executed, looks amazing. Has a clear design approach which is consistent. The level design is only so-so; there are too many decision points for a game that asks for exhaustive exploration. As opposed to Sonic, its most obvious reference, which generally has no incentive for exploration and is more fun for that decision.
reviews.author: Benjamin Wheeler

reviews.title: Absolutely love it.
reviews.comment: This a truly amazing game, i love the graphics and sound and basically everything is great. Its a shame its not all free, but im happy to pay for a game this good. :-)
reviews.author: Sarah Hawkings

reviews.title: CORDY
reviews.comment: BRILLIANT GAME,LOVE IT,GOOD GRAPHICS FOR A PHONE,COLOURFULL,WORTH 5 STARS,BUT,IS THERE ANY CHANCE OF GETTING CENTAPEDE 3D I HAVE IT FOR PLAYSTATION 2,BUT WOULD LOVE IT FOR THE PHONE,NOT TO KEEN ON THE CLASSIC CENTAPEDE I LOVE THE WAY WALLY GOES AROUND IN A LITTLE LADYBIRD SHIP, AND ZAPS THE INSECTS SO COOL,PLEASE MAKE MORE PLATFORM 3D,IM HOOKED,ON THEM NOW THANKS,WILL ALLWAYS RATE AN EXCELENT PLATFORM GAME, THANKS AGAIN ANGEL.
reviews.author: ANGELA BARTON

reviews.title: Love it, only...
reviews.comment: I thought my purchase would be valid on all my devices. Reply to my email please, devs.
reviews.author: Monica Moreno

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: You will like it.
reviews.author: Rod Jones

reviews.title: Amazing Game!!!!
reviews.comment: Worth every penny.  Thanks

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.comment: I have been playing this game for about 2 years (obviously not every day haha) but I have finally COMPLETED EVERY LEVEL!!! NEVER THOUGHT I\'D DO IT!!!

reviews.title: A high quality game
reviews.comment: Its a great game with a detailed graphics and a great gameplay but the negative things about the game its not a full game which means we have to pay it, but overall its a great game

reviews.comment: This game is one of the best out there. I wish i could buy the game!!

reviews.comment: started playing on another divice and now half to pay agen please add a restor in app purchis if do I add 5 star

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: Cordy is a truly unique and delightful game.  A rare find!
